description: Paperwork that reads "USAID" was found inside the car of Mohamed Sabry Soliman, who's accused of throwing explosives at pro-Israel protesters in Boulder, Colorado.
content: Paperwork with the word "USAID" was found in the car of Mohamed Sabry Soliman, who's accused of allegedly throwing explosives at a group in Boulder, Colorado, peacefully protesting for the release of… [+3518 chars]

author: Louis Casiano, Jasmine Baehr
title: Escaped zebra caught on camera running along busy Tennessee roadway as chaos forces lane closures
description: Authorities in Tennessee are dealing with a zebra on the loose, disrupting traffic on Interstate 24. The animal escaped from its owners over the weekend.
content:
A zebra remains on the loose after the animal escaped from its owners in Tennessee over the weekend, authorities said. 
The owners "obtained" the zebra on Friday night and reported it missing on Sat… [+1076 chars]
